long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# What is Importiv

Importiv is an app that allows you to add products from wholesale websites directly to your store. 

Simply install the plugin in your Chrome browser and navigate to any products of your liking on any wholesale website and add the product to your store. The entire process is done within a few clicks only. 

# Why Importiv is a Must-Have App as a Dropshipping necessity

- Works for an empty store or stores with products ready
- Manipulate products' pricing during the upload
- Have the option to add products needed from the wholesalers 
- Import product from multiple wholesalers in a single app
- Export inventory to a Shopify format file to add to store later
- Choose to import 20+ different product fields such as description, title, images, cost, tags, meta fields, and many more
- Import product reviews from the wholesale website to increase customers' confidence and trust in buying the product

# Supported wholesale websites .. Most major marketplaces.
